definition[0]: having the qualities or ability needed to do something
example[0]: I don’t think he’s capable of murder.
example[1]: The company isn’t capable of handling an order that large.
example[2]: I’m perfectly capable of looking after myself, thank you!
explanation[0]: You say that someone is capable of doing something
example[3]: He is capable of doing it by himself
bad_example[0]: He is capable to do it by himself
